name: NS Black Ops Mercenary Pack
detailed_description:
For the soldier of fortune who isn't tied down to any ideology, the Black Ops Mercenary pack provides the Nanite Systems’ entire line of sleek Black Infantry weapons usable across all empires, as well as weapons for ALL Nanite Systems vehicles, dark camouflage and a 3-month 50% exp boost. Whether you need a sidearm, rocket launcher or assault rifle, the Black Ops Mercenary pack ensures the job will be done in style.

This bundle includes:

  • Skyguard
  • M20 Basilisk - F
  • Hunter QCX - B
  • MKV -B Suppressed
  • NS-30B Vandal
  • L105 Zepher
  • L100 Python AP
  • M60-G Bulldog (Rear)
  • G30 Walker (Front)
  • M40 Fury-F
  • Heroic Boost - 3 Month
  • CAS 14-E, Pelter Rocket Pod
  • NS-7B PDW, M12 Kobalt-H
  • Dark Digital Camo
  • Short Circuit Camo
  • NS-11AB
  • NS-11CB
  • NS-15MB
  • NS Decimator-B
  • NS-44B Commissioner
  • Dual-75 Duster
  • M60-A Bulldog (Left)
  • M60-A Bulldog (Right)
  • NS Baron G5B
  • M40 Fury-H
  • NS-357B Underboss
  • NS Annihilator-B

Note: The boost contained in this bundle will only be granted to the in-game character that redeems the bundle. Any other items will be granted to all characters of the appropriate faction.

short_description: For the soldier of fortune who isn't tied down to any ideology, the Black Ops Mercenary pack provides the Nanite Systems’ entire line of sleek Black Infantry weapons usable across all empires, as well as weapons for ALL Nanite Systems vehicles, dark camouflage and a 3-month 50% exp boost.
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo E6850 or higher / AMD Phenom II X2 or higher
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:nVidia GeForce 8600 series or higher / AMD or ATI 4850 series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible Sound Card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:Intel i5 processor or higher / AMD Phenom II X6 or higher
  • Memory:6 GB RAM
  • Graphics:nVidia GeForce 540 or higher / AMD HD 6870 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible Sound Card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
